alert.note: Alert for Glades (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Warning issued January 30 at 2:28AM EST until January 31 at 8:00AM EST by NWS Miami
info.description: ...HARD FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM EST THIS MORNING... ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO 8 AM EST MONDAY... * WHAT...For the Hard Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 27. For the Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 32 expected. * WHERE...Glades County. * WHEN...For the Hard Freeze Warning, until 9 AM EST this morning. For the Freeze Warning, from 3 AM to 8 AM EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
